description: Proxmox VE dashboard with metrics inside InfluxDB v2.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> last()
//  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpustat" and
    r._field == "cpu"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpustat" and
    r._field == "cpus"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> limit(n:1)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "memory" and
    r._field == "memtotal"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> limit(n:1)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "memory" and
    r._field == "swaptotal"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> limit(n:1)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "avail" or r._field == "used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "${server}")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    _time: r._time,
    _measurement: r.measurement,
    _field: "used_perc",
    _value: float(v: 100) / (float(v: r.avail) + float(v: r.used)) * float(v:r.used)
     }))
  |> drop(columns: ["avail","used"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "memory")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "memtotal" or r["_field"] == "memused")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /${server:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
      _time: r._time, 
      host: r.host, 
      ram_usage: (r.memused / r.memtotal)
  }))

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpustat" and
    r._field == "avg1"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpustat" and
    r._field == "avg5"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpustat" and
    r._field == "avg15"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

panels.description: Memory in use by Host OS, VM's and Containers
panels.title: Memory in Use

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpustat" and
    r._field == "wait"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn:mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "storages")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpustat" and
    r._field == "avg1"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /${server:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "memory")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "memtotal" or r["_field"] == "memused")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] =~ /${server:regex}/)
//  |> group(columns: ["host","nodename"], mode: "by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpustat" or r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cpus" or r["_field"] == "cpu" or r["_field"] == "status" or r["_field"] == "uptime" or r["_field"] == "maxmem" or r["_field"] == "mem" or r["_field"] == "maxdisk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "qemu") // Filter for QEMU only
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["vmid"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with ram_usage_percent: (float(v: r.mem) / float(v: r.maxmem)) * 100.0 }))
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
  |> keep(columns: ["host", "vmid", "nodename", "status", "object", "uptime", "cpus", "cpu", "maxmem", "mem", "maxdisk", "ram_usage_percent"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpustat" or r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cpus" or r["_field"] == "cpu" or r["_field"] == "status" or r["_field"] == "uptime" or r["_field"] == "maxmem" or r["_field"] == "mem" or r["_field"] == "maxdisk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "lxc") // Filter for LXC only
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["vmid"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with ram_usage_percent: (float(v: r.mem) / float(v: r.maxmem)) * 100.0 }))
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
  |> keep(columns: ["host", "vmid", "nodename", "status", "object", "uptime", "cpus", "cpu", "maxmem", "mem", "maxdisk", "ram_usage_percent"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpustat" or r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "lxc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] =~ /${server:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value == "running" then 1 else 0 }))  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) 
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "host", "_value"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "lxc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "profiler"

option profiler.enabledProfilers = ["query", "operator"]

mem = from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "lxc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

maxmem = from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "maxmem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "lxc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

join(
    tables: {mem:mem, maxmem:maxmem},
    on: ["_time","_stop","_start","host"]

)

|> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: float(v:r._value_mem) / float(v:r._value_maxmem) * float(v: 100),
      host: r.host
    })
  )

|> group(columns: ["host"])

import "math"
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "diskread")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "lxc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] =~ /${server:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["host","nodename"], mode: "by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: math.abs(x: r._value)}))
//  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "math"
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "diskwrite")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "lxc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] =~ /${server:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["host","nodename"], mode: "by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: math.abs(x: r._value)}))
//  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "netin")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "lxc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] =~ /${server:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["host","nodename"], mode: "by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
//  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "netout")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "lxc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] =~ /${server:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["host","nodename"], mode: "by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
//  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "qemu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] =~ /${server:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["host","nodename"], mode: "by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
//  |> yield(name: "mean")

mem = from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "qemu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] =~ /^${server:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

maxmem = from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "maxmem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "qemu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] =~ /^${server:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

join(
    tables: {mem:mem, maxmem:maxmem},
    on: ["_time","_stop","_start","host","nodename"]

)

|> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: float(v:r._value_mem) / float(v:r._value_maxmem) * float(v:100),
      host: r.host,
      nodename: r.nodename
    })
  )

|> group(columns: ["host","nodename"], mode: "by")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "system" and
    r.object == "nodes"
  )
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["host"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["host"])
  |> distinct(column: "host")
list.label: Server
list.name: server

query.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "system" and
    r.object == "nodes"
  )
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["host"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["host"])
  |> distinct(column: "host")

title: Proxmox Cluster
